text: Nĩkũiganĩire mũrutwo aiganane na mũrutani wake, o na ndungata ĩiganane na mũmĩathi. Angĩkorwo mwene nyũmba nĩetĩtwo Beelizebuli-rĩ,10:25 Rĩĩtwa Beelizebuli rĩgĩtaũrwo nĩ kuuga “Mũnene wa ndaimono,” no Kĩhibirania Beelizebubu rĩataũragwo “Mũnene wa ngi.” githĩ andũ a nyũmba yake matigetwo marĩĩtwa mooru gũkĩra rĩu!
